actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Ray M. Reed.

summary.text: Deems a named individual to have suffered a disabling injury solely as the result of hospitalization and medical treatment arising from alleged negligent treatment at the Memphis Veterans Administration Hospital, for purposes of determining veterans' disability compensation eligibility. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to pay such compensation. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay such individual a specified sum in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for nonmedical damages arising from such injury.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ray M. Reed.
